oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maureen O’Hara receives key to the City upon arrival to Nashville, Tennessee, 1961 July 23
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Actress Maureen O’Hara presented with the key to the City of Nashville and a bouquet of flowers upon her arrival to Nashville, Tennessee, July 23, 1961. O’Hara, the Irish-born actress who starred in Miracle on 34th Street, among other films, starred in two movies released in 1961: “The Parent Trap,” and “The Deadly Companions.” While in Nashville, O’Hara made a personal appearance at a special event at the Paramount Theatre. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: O’Hara, Maureen, 1920-
